item.title: Alignment
item.description: See also: Overton Window and this blog on alignment research The act of aligning oneself with a particular group or ideology.This can be done for a variety of reasons, including: To gain social acceptance To gain power To gain resources Often known as a solution to solve ‚Äúhallucination‚Äù in large models token-generation.

item.title: Overton Window
item.description: also known as window of discourse A window into the ideas that frames ideas that people are prepared to entertain.All ideas outside the window are not seriously considered.

item.title: ethics
item.description: Closely connected to value theory, or moral philosophy.Kantian ethics presupposes that there is a universal moral law that applies to all rational beings, or his deontological ethics framework that based on ‚Äúcategorical imperative‚Äù.

item.title: Root mean square
item.description: See also: pdf probl√®me 1.The Root Mean Square (RMS) value of a signal f(t) that is periodic with period T is given by the equation T1‚Äã‚à´0T‚Äã(f(t))2dt‚Äã It can be shown that the RMS value of u(t)=Bsinœât is 2‚ÄãB‚Äã 1.a Square wave The square wave function is defined as: f(t)={10‚Äãif 0‚â§t<2T‚Äãif 2T‚Äã‚â§t<T‚Äã import sympy as sp t = sp.symbols('t') T = 2 RMS = sp.sqrt(1/T * sp.integrate(1, (t, 0, T/2))) RMS = 2‚Äã1‚Äã 1.b Sawtooth wave A sawtooth wave function is defined as: f(t)=T2A‚Äã(t‚àí2T‚Äã) import sympy as sp t = sp.symbols('t') T = 1 A = 0.5 f_t = 2 * A / T * (t - T/2) RMS = sp.sqrt(1/T * sp.integrate(f_t**2, (t, 0, T))) RMS = 63‚Äã‚Äã 1.c sine wave A general form of the sine wave can be written as f(t)=Asin(œât+œï) Amplitude is 2.3, no phase shift RMS = 2‚Äã2.3‚Äã probl√®me 2.

item.title: Camus
item.description: Of the absurd reasoning and existentialism.The Myth of Sisyphus Absurd and suicide Suicide is the solution for the absurd: People never died because of ontological arguments Suicide is often the result of people who didn‚Äôt find worth in the living Life is not worth living therefore I took the easy way out as a paradox: Suicide is the justification of meaning of life ‚Üê the most important question for philosophers From Nietzchean prose, those who say ‚Äúno‚Äù acts as if they said ‚Äúyes‚Äù: Schopenhauer Fantasise the act of eluding: Hope of another life one must ‚Äúdeserve‚Äù or trickery those who lives not for life itself but for some great idea that will transcend it, refine it, give it meaning, and betray it.

item.title: Empirical Estimation of Transfer Functions for First Order Systems
item.description: See lab notes prelab.The transfer function of a DC electric motor with respect to angular velocity is: Gœâ‚Äã(s)=V(s)Œ©(s)‚Äã=œÑs+1A‚Äã Where A and œÑ are positive, real-valued constants V(s) and Œ©(s) are voltage and angular velocity as function of s in the Laplace domain.

item.title: Prompt engineering
item.description: A constructive way to form communications with LLMs.As we improve the quality of prompts, we can expect better results from the models.Similar to linguistic, a good prompt is a good form of communication with the system.
